name: **Inishturkbeg**
description: Inishturkbeg L943-906 Sheet 30 Very privately owned and recently developed as a commercial enterprise involving rental holidays and the production whiskey and Irish traditional music. This island is possibly Irelandâ€™s poshest island? Land, with permission only, at the original habitation in the SE, which is conserved. The modern housing is above the SW. Everything is of the highest standard, even the tennis court, horses, and long-horned cattle. Developed and modernised by unorthodox millionaire Nadim Sadek, it was sold on in 2013. Views from the summit are stunning. The nearest access is from a sheltered N facing pontoon and slip in Ross Channel due E at L957-904.
